title: E-Commerce Application
description: Built an e-commerce site with Angular and Django REST Framework, featuring user authentication, shopping cart, and checkout.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Created a personal portfolio using React, HTML, and CSS. Features a responsive design with sections for About Me, Projects, Experience, Skills, and Contact.

title: Crickk 11 Scrutiny
description: Developed a machine learning based web application, aimed at predicting various outcomes in the game of cricket, like match result, first innings score.
